name: AILEEN SHOOTER
description:
Aileen is a one or two-player vertical shooter.

Set in the future where a rogue AI has taken control of the planet’s defenses.

Features:

  • One Player Mode
  • Two Player Mode
  • 10 Levels of Mayhem
  • Earn credits to upgrade Ship
  • Choose your upgrades wisely
  • Story Driven
  • Collect Awards
  • Difficulty Settings

Supports Keyboard and Joypads/Controllers

AVAILABLE FOR PC (Windows 10 64 bit)

COMING SOON FOR LINUX.

INCLUDES SOUNDTRACK.
